data.title: Movies set in former yugoslavia
data.meta_description: Movies set in former yugoslavia: The Balkan Line (2019), Bound Cargo (2003), Warriors (2002), The Living and the Dead (2007), Before the Rain (1994), Sex Traffic (2004), The Battle of Sutjeska (1973), WR: Mysteries of the Organism (1971), Warriors (1999), As If I Am Not There (2010)
